ProjectTitle: Hearing, Assenting, and Acting: Later Medieval Accounts of Testimonial Belief and Knowledge, 1300-1550
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/06/2023
Documentation: how will you document your data during your project, will you use tools such as Zotero or NVivo, or add readme files to your folders; which metadata standard will you use and how? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: Why are you storing data at 3 different locations, will you store 3 copies of the same data, or different data on different locations? Would it not be easier to use one location with automatic back up and/or versioning, eg KU Leuven onedrive. To compare storage solutions see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: KU Leuven RDR will add a DIO to your datasets.
label: good with suggestions
